body_html:
I has been struggling for this problem for a whole day with docker.
Finally I found a decent solution which is to use nvidia-docker: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/docker.

Finally I found a decent solution which is to use nvidia-docker: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/tools/docker.
